import React, { useState } from 'react' import Footer from '../components/shared/Footer' import { data } from '../data/data' import Card from '../components/shared/Card' import { FaSearch } from 'react-icons/fa' const Menu = () => { const [input, setInput] = useState('') const getFoodItems = input === '' ? data : data.filter((item) => item.name.toLowerCase() === `${input.toLowerCase()}`) return ( <>
setInput(e.target.value)} />

Popular Cuisines

{getFoodItems.map((filterItems) => ( ))}
) } export default Menu
